about: The Designer's Choice was created by Nicholas A. Judy with his field recordings, sound recordings, sound designs and production elements and the ultimate sound effects library from around the world. Do you want to hear something new from The Designer's Choice? Yes, you will according to the circumstances. You will get my new sound effects recordings, designs and production elements under The Designer's Choice. All sound effects are carefully categorized according to the UCS system. NOTE: These are all the recordings and designs that belongs to everyone to use for free and my studio use. Newer sounds will belong to me using my Smartphone, Blue Snowball Mic, etc. Recorders and Equipment Used: Samsung Smartphone, Blue Snowball Microphone, Tascam DR-05, Zoom H1n, Zoom H2essential Recorder, H3-VR 360ยบ Audio Recorder, Cortado Mk III Contact Microphone, TR-ORCA Hydrophone, SENNHEISER Wired Professional MKH 416-P48U3 Short Shotgun Interference Tube Microphone, Black, Stephoscopic Recorders, Electromagnetic Field Recorders, Femur Design's Theremin and much more. We're searching for a distributor and publisher of sound effects libraries, So they can find me in Soundly and Archive.org.
